job_title: 【採線上面談】Product Designer (UI/UX) (台中市政府旁)

jd: Swifteam is one-stop remote device management for a more efficient employee experience.|||As the world of technology continues to evolve, so does the need for product designers. A product designer is responsible for the look, feel, and overall experience of the product. You work closely with engineers and other team members to create products that are not only functional but also visually appealing and user-friendly.|||As a Product Designer, you will build the core of products in a spectacularly robust fashion.|||- Have a strong understanding of user experience|||- Create designs that are both user-friendly and visually appealing.|||- Work with stakeholders across the company to bring new features and products.|||- Think outside the box and come up with new and innovative ideas.|||- Take feedback and use it to improve their designs.|||- Have 2+ years of Web UI/UX experience.|||- Have a strong portfolio demonstrating an understanding of different design principles.|||- Hold yourself and others to a high bar.|||- Take pride in working on projects to successful completion.|||- Thrive in a collaborative environment involving different stakeholders and subject matter experts.|||Swifteam was launched in 2022 and accelerated by the Y Combinator program. We were building a language learning product and decided to pivot the team to focus on solving the biggest issue we faced as a remote team.|||We look at Swifteam as a constant work in progress. We’re here to support each other in our curiosity and creativity – which we pursue thoughtful discussion and knowledge-sharing among a diverse set of peers and colleagues.|||We want to hear from you and share with you our vision. We will love to connect people passionate about remote work and productivity solutions as much as we do.

Webサイトやアプリ、デジタルサイネージのUI / UXデザイン、グラフィックデザインなど、幅広いデジタル領域のデザインを担当します。 カタリストと共にUXを考案したり、エンジニアと共同でUIのブラッシュアップを行い、アウトプットのクオリティを高めます。|||※ Please note that Pre-Advanced Level / Advanced Level Japanese is required.|||など|||STEP1 : Webエントリー&ポートフォリオ提出|||STEP2 : 面接(2~3回)|||STEP3 : 内定|||※ 場合によっては、選考フローが変更になる場合がございます|||※ 面接は日本語で行う予定です|||大学院・大学・短大・高専・専門学校を卒業または卒業見込みで、かつ職務経歴のない方|||（日本語はN1またはN1相当のレベル方）|||大学卒 短大卒 高専学校卒 専門学校卒|||月給25万円～(学歴問わず能力・スキルにより決定)|||10：00～19：00|||半期決算賞与(年2回)|||・正社員・交通費一部支給(月2万円まで)|||・昇給随時、各種社会保険完備|||・永年勤続賞(3,5,10,20,30年ごとに30,50,100,200,300万円支給)|||・家族手当(子1人目：月2万円支給、2人目以降は＋月5000円支給)|||・アフター交流手当て(社員4名以上が参加するスポーツに対して、費用補助)|||・各プロジェクトのキックオフ・打ち上げの費用補助|||・勉強会・カンファレンスの参加費用支給(事前申請制)|||原則として、土曜、日曜、祝日、年次有給休暇(入社半年後付与)、年末年始、夏期休暇、産前産後休暇、育児休業、看護休暇|||チームラボ本社 東京都千代田区神田小川町2-12 小川町進興ビル|||りそなグループの「りそなスマート口座」は、“スマホがあなたの銀行に“ をコンセプトとしたスマホアプリです。 様々な銀行取引を、アプリひとつで簡単に完結できるよう全体の画面と機能を設計しました。|||全日本空輸株式会社のメンバーサービスである「ANAマイレージクラブ」の専用アプリです。ANAマイレ－ジクラブを身近に感じられる機能を取り入れ、提供されているサービスをわかりやすく、視覚的に表現しました。|||これまでにない“自販機での新しい価値体験を提案し続ける“をコンセプトとした最新型自販機です。「イノベーション自販機」対応スマートフォンアプリ「acure pass（アキュアパス）」は、アプリで購入した商品を駅の自販機で受け取れる新しいサービス / プラットフォームです。
job_title: UI/UX Designer (Web / Mobile App 設計師)
skill_cata_tag: Sketch|||Figma|||Adobe XD|||Adobe Photoshop|||Adobe Illustrator|||Adobe After Effects

jd: • Responsible for the UI/UX of the gaming website.|||• Responsible for the design components of online service activities; such as banners|||• Actively work with other departments of the company; such as PM and development teams.|||• Those who have more than 1~3 years of experience in gaming website art development and are willing to learn art tools.|||• Strong ideas for gaming website design, creative and have a positive personality.|||• Strong sense of responsibility and teamwork, proactive in work, good communication skills.|||• Strong 2D drawing ability (preferably familiar with 3D software).|||• Familiar with the features of gaming games is a plus.|||• Familiar with Cocos2D, unity3D dynamic production or AE is preferred.|||*請務必附上作品附檔或連結。*

崗位要求:|||1.根據公司產品規劃，完成移動端APP產品和產品相關的用戶界面、LOGO視覺設計|||2.負責與開發人員配合完成APP開發前期界面設計和後期美化工作，保證其美觀性與易用性|||3.負責APP整體結構和視覺設計、創意|||4.負責日常運營中美術及UI設計工作。|||5.頻繁面對企劃、程式設計等相關人員，進行多方相互溝通。 具備專長及條件: *獨立完成APP項目界面和交互設計，兩年以上遊戲項目經驗。 *精通photoshop、Illustartor、flash等設計工具，擅長APP UI設計、html5、css等設計。 *對移動應用設計或網站設計有豐富的經驗，（對平面設計、網頁設計、移動應用設計、圖標設計、符號設計等都有了解）。 *視覺美感佳、色彩敏銳度高，對遊戲風格掌握度高。善於處理資訊關係的空間美感。 *具良好溝通能力，喜歡團隊合作。 *其他海外工作一年以上工作經驗者，能快適應異國環境者佳。 *有手繪能力為加分項。 *面試前請提供相關作品集。

Reports to: Head of Product|||Location: Taipei, Taiwan|||Narrow Pacific Ltd. — a venture backed software company — is looking for candidates to join our product team. You will work with the Head of Product and our senior team to design world-class software products.

職責一：項目把控|||1. 把控項目整體美術風格與品質（角色與場景），為手機端提供高品質的遊戲背景、角色、宣傳圖等素材；|||2. 把控專案美術品質與進度，以保證專案按時達到預期效果。|||職責二：風格把控專案溝通|||1. 與策劃充分溝通，幫助項目搭建遊戲世界觀及其美術風格 ，共同完成移動遊戲的設計開發工作。|||1. 3年及以上遊戲行業原畫(角色/場景)工作經驗，有扎實的美術基礎和出色的設計能力；|||2. 良好高效的美宣繪畫技法，對結構、線條、色彩、光影等的把控嫺熟；|||3. 擅長日韓美寫實及Q版等多種美術風格；|||4. 良好的團隊溝通能力、責任心和敬業精神。|||5. 接受外派海外工作安排。

工作內容:|||1. 基於Cocos Creator 引擎開發遊戲項目|||2.根據產品需求，完成功能模組的設計，開發和測試工作|||3.與產品企劃、工程師、美術以及測試人員密切的合作，完成遊戲開發|||4.配合專案時程與項目需求，獨立完成職務內任務|||5.負責新遊戲的設計、開發，並實現相關的工作、函式庫|||6.負責遊戲上線、優化及Bug解決|||7.其他主管交辦事務|||＃有區塊鏈經驗佳 ＃具有串接遊戲經驗 ＃具備高度責任心、良好的溝通能力與團隊合作精神

Splashtop is a SaaS company offering industry-leading remote access / support services, one-to-many video conferencing, and mobile mirroring apps.Our product range covers multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android) and is highly regarded in the IT and education community (see: www.splashtop.com and www.mirroring360.com, or look for Splashtop in App Store / Google Play).|||1. Perform outbound calls to potential customers trialing Splashtop services.|||2. Develop and maintain relations with potential customers.|||3. Encourage customers to buy Splashtop products by matching customer requirements with suitable Splashtop products and services.|||4. Advise prospective and current customers by answering questions and addressing their concerns about purchased products.|||5. Collect and track customer feedback and forward them to the right internal channels.|||6. Provide suggestions for product improvement.|||Foreign residents are welcomed.|||• Flexible working hours|||• Leave policies superior to statutory requirements. (First year 10 days paid annual leaves)|||• 1-day paid birthday leave|||• Height adjustable office workstations for employees|||• English course, workplace massage and refreshments are provided|||• Labor Insurance, national Health Insurance and group insurance|||• Annual health checkup|||• Travel allowance|||• Cash gift for employees’ birthday|||• Year-end banquet and Christmas party|||• Employee gathering lunch once per month|||• Employee club activity subsidy

As an Outbound Sales Development Representative, you will support and execute the regional strategy. Through outbound prospecting efforts via social, email and cold calling efforts, you generate interest at potential new customers which results demos for account executives supporting towards revenue growth and expanding Splashtop’s footprint. Your role is to lay the foundation for Splashtop sales by engaging with prospects to helping them understand the value we bring to their organization by sharing industry specific demonstrated business outcomes with the goal of moving them into the sales process.|||In this role, you are Splashtop’s first point of contact, you play a key role in building the brand, creating a great first impression, and building momentum for not only the sales team but the company as a whole.|||The key responsibilities of this role will require you to:|||- Creating and prioritizing strategic target account lists with Account Executives.|||- Create new business opportunities by scheduling demos for the account executives through effective outbound efforts which is through cold calling, email and social platforms.|||- Enthusiastically working on outbound activities, representing the company in a highly professional manner.|||- Successfully and accurately answering prospect questions and providing appropriate additional information to the Account Executives.|||- Become familiar with Splashtop's core products and be able to describe product details to gauge the best-fit solution.|||- Understanding potential customers’ use case and advising them on how Splashtop products can help them in their environment.|||- Logging of all activities and summaries of prospect interactions into salesforce.|||- Actively manage sales channels by tracking and following-up on opportunities scheduled to drive to customer commitment and achieve and exceed targets.|||- Working closely with the Marketing and Communication department in order to build campaigns that ensure lead quality and quantity.|||- Actively drive sales to develop new opportunities within your assigned territory and collaborate with other sales & marketing teams to ensure growth attainment.|||- Forecast, track and report on key account metrics, designing and implementing innovative solutions to improve specific results.|||- 1-2 years of customer-facing work experience (Sales and/or SaaS experience is a +)|||- Proven prospecting and social selling skills (cold calling, email, social)|||- Excellent written and verbal communication skills plus the ability to build professional rapport quickly by phone with all levels of stakeholders|||- You must be competitive, self-motivated, and have the desire for rapid career advancement|||- Demonstrated ability to communicate, present and influence credibly and effectively at all levels of the organization, including executives and C-level in the mid-market sized organizations|||- Excellent organizational and time management skills|||- Strong interest in a sales career with friendly and helpful attitude|||- A team player capable of working within a collaborative environment|||- Experience in selling IT solutions is a big advantage|||- Customer centric mindset. Everything we do is to support our prospects and customers to the best of our ability. We go above and beyond to deliver them the best quality of service possible.|||- Result oriented. We are relentless in the pursuit of our goals. We are goal-oriented and experiment in a measured way to learn through experience. We are committed to continuous, iterative improvement for our customers and ourselves.|||- Entrepreneurial spirit.

jd: Splashtop is a SaaS company offering industry-leading remote access / support services, one-to-many video conferencing, and mobile mirroring apps. Our product range covers multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android) and is highly regarded in the IT and education community (see: www.splashtop.com and www.mirroring360.com or look for Splashtop in App Store / Google Play).|||Currently, we would like to find an English-speaking customer service representative whose main task is to assist customers in solving a broad range of technical and market-related topics and to improve customer satisfaction for their success. The details of the job include:|||1. Communicate with customers and recommend them for the right Splashtop service.|||2. Collect/track customer feedback and provide timely solutions.|||3. Analyze reported technical issues, and co-work with internal developers to remedy problems.|||4. Use internal ticket systems to answer email questions.|||5. Use a text chat system and phone calls to answer users' questions.|||6. Provide suggestions for product improvement.|||• Flexible working hours|||• Leave policies superior to statutory requirements. (The first year 10 days paid annual leaves)|||• 1-day paid birthday leave|||• Height adjustable office workstations for employees|||• English course, workplace massage, and refreshments are provided|||• Labor Insurance, National Health Insurance, and group insurance|||• Annual health checkup|||• Travel allowance|||• Cash gift for employees’ birthday|||• Year-end banquet and Christmas party|||• Employee gathering lunch once per month|||• Employee club activity subsidy

Splashtop, the leading provider of remote desktop and device collaboration solutions, one-to-many video conferencing, and mobile mirroring apps. Our product range covers multiple platforms (Windows, macOS, iOS, Android) and is highly regarded in the IT and education community (see: www.splashtop.com and www.mirroring360.com or look for Splashtop in App Store / Google Play).|||We are hiring a detail-oriented Communications Program Manager to handle all programmatic communications with Prospects and Customers and help increase Customer Satisfaction. The position is available immediately, and the location for this role is at the Splashtop office in Taipei (Taiwan).|||Splashtop provides a large number of “avenues” that customers and prospects can leverage to communicate with the company. Inquiries that are clearly defined as sales leads are being handled by the various sales teams (one in Taipei and one in California), but there are a number of cases where the inquiries are not directly about sales, but instead about feedback or questions. As part of our well-recognized culture of maximum and total responsiveness, the Communications Program Manager role is to systematically follow-up and engage with every non-sales inquiry. Those inquiries will come mostly in the form of emails to Splashtop and the Communications Manager will need to respond to those in a professional and timely fashion.|||The candidate will need to have a minimum of 1 year of experience in a B2B environment where he/she was handling and directly responsible for 50-100 one-to-one communications each day via email. Attention to detail and follow-up management is paramount to being successful in this position.|||1. Triage, monitor and determine how to respond to respondents to NPS surveys and Auto-renewals Turn-offs notifications,|||2. Systematically thank people who enter a review for Splashtop on review sites such as Capterra or G2Crowd, and follow-up with them,|||3. Systematically respond to people who provided feedback on trialing Splashtop products,|||4. Route and escalate internally those communications as needed,|||5. Help with Inbound leads in case of peak activity,|||6. Provide help with maintenance or creation of Accounts and/or leads in Salesforce.|||1. BA/BS Degree required (or equivalent 4 years University degree)|||2. Perfect English mandatory (write, read, speak)|||3. 1 year minimum of work in a high velocity B2B environment with responsibility for first line of communication to the Prospects/Customers|||4. Computer proficiency – Ability to multi-task across tools and platforms (Outlook, Salesforce, etc…) without making mistakes|||1. Salesforce experience

jd: ✪BRICKS@menu【 全業界最動感的餐飲看板 】|||餐飲店家不用作影片，就能動畫般的螢幕看板，更能串接各種實用、有趣的資訊在看板上即時與客人互動 ! 讓客人的美好評論、售完資訊、即時促銷特價、UberEat 排單、節日風格通通掛上螢幕 ， 行銷手法更活用，經營管理更直覺。|||快來看看 > >|||上線首月即接到近百間店家詢問，目前急徵業務中|||✪ 具體工作內容：|||❶開發客戶，與客戶接洽，介紹BRICKS@menu，訂單簽約。|||❷ 確認客戶需求，協助客戶進行在系統上的設定，提供售前及售後服務。|||❸ 協助客戶成功並讓客戶的看板比客戶鄰近對手更加吸睛 !|||❹ 參展進行介紹，主動推廣給更多客戶。|||● 良好的溝通表達能力，可以將產品有邏輯性的介紹給客戶。|||● 透過文字訊息對談，使用視訊軟體與客戶對談或親自拜訪客戶。|||● 負責任且能獨立完成任務，願意自行尋找問題、規劃解決方案並和團隊溝思最佳解。|||● 具備責任感，可以將自己份內的工作認真完整執行。|||● 擁有學習新事物的熱情，保有一定的彈性，能充份支援團隊各種相關工作，協助團隊完成目標。|||Step 1、透過電話與您輕鬆的聊聊，簡單了解彼此。|||Step 2、相約至公司面談，更深度的確認您是否為我們所要找的人，也會讓您實際體驗了解未來所要接觸的產品。|||Step 3、電話溝通確認意向及薪資條件。|||在深入了解公司文化及產品後，可彈性部分遠端工作。|||- 員工股票選擇權，依對團隊貢獻無償配發。|||- 優於勞基法的休假制度、彈性年假。|||- 彈性上下班時間，經核定後可遠端工作。|||- 定期舉辦尾牙、員工出遊，增進員工情誼及凝聚力。|||- 免費零食咖啡飲料 Bar。|||- 外部進修訓練補助。|||- 定期享有免費健康檢查。|||- 有機會優先接觸新上市的人機互動裝置。|||- 享有關係企業員購福利（EnterSpace 密室逃脫、MyBigDay 婚禮 Party）。

projects.|||• Be proactive and stay informed about market trends, opportunities, risks and new blockchain projects.|||• Strong analytical skills and experience in analyzing blockchain projects thoroughly, perform due diligence on project teams, protocol design, financial viability, smart contract and implementations, with a strong attention to detail, identify associated risks (especially for financial risk) and evaluate the technological value and future potential preciously.|||• Ability to conduct proactive research on blockchain projects by aggregating information from a variety of sources, including discussion, technical repositories and get feedback from teams, then draw informed conclusions from incomplete information, organizing an analysis as complete as possible in order to write brief research reports to present your findings and recommendations to our Strategy Team and Engineering Team.|||▋Preferred|||• A bachelor (or above) degree in technical (i.e. mathematics, engineering or computer science or equivalent), with financial and/or blockchain experience.|||• Active in Crypto communities and can get the latest information in the ecosystem through a wide and diverse range of channels.|||• Positive influencer in Crypto communities, especially well-known promoters in the ecosystem to assist us in building our community.|||• In-depth research or engineering experience on smart contracts, with strong security risk sensitivity, especially those who have discovered protocol level or smart contract vulnerabilities are strongly preferred.|||• Ability to understand and solve complex challenges and problems.|||• Enthusiasm for the future of blockchain technology, web3, and low-level protocol development.|||• An open minded research approach and genuine intellectual curiosity.|||▋ The steps of the hiring process are as follows:|||1. Submit resume.|||2. An online interview with hiring managers.|||3. Give a presentation on a particular topic we provide.|||4. Orientation interview with HR and discuss salary expectations.|||At any stage that we decide not to move forward with the interview process, we will inform you our decision **within 2 weeks**.|||If you do not hear from us by then, you’re welcome to contact us!|||In the final step of the interview process, you can discuss with the core members of our team about the company, the position or career advancement.|||You can put forward your job expectations, salary and so on.

jd: ＜概要＞|||「秘書」的職能是創造一個公司高層們能專注於經營以及公司業務務的環境。|||希望秘書做的事情：|||＜工作目標＞|||・對外，有效率收集和提供管理決策所需的所有資訊；對內，創造公司高層們可以100%專注於經營決策以及公司業務的環境|||・考慮公司高層們的健康狀況來進行膳食安排、各種費用報銷管理等等的高層交付任務|||・於高效的工作環境之中輔助公司高層順利進行日常業務。|||＜會議調整＞|||・與個管理層的日常安排以及管理，會議前要約製作|||・會議中的彙總，重點標記以及會議主持角色。會中記錄，會後總結。|||希望秘書具備的能力：|||＜溝通能力＞|||・在高層與各部門之間，一邊深入了解公司業務，一邊快速掌握當下狀況以及案件進度，充當良好溝通的橋梁。|||・人際交往能力：商務禮儀，溝通協調能力，注重細節能力（來訪，VIP客戶對應）|||・多任務處理：其他部門和業務部門的支持工作（能識別並且提出公司內的短期/長期需求，並且有效的輔助需求落地實現）|||＜高效・快速處理能力＞|||・在要求高效，高速的工作環境之下，需有迅速掌握當下情形，分析之後提供最好的解決方案的能力。|||・ 日常會議多以30分鍾爲一個單位進行，也會有很多臨時需要加進來的會議。在複雜的情況下判斷優先順序並合理調整高層們的日程安排。|||＜獨立思考提案能力＞|||・具備獨立思考和積極創造新事物的態度，細心、迅速、靈活的反應能力，以及從不同立場把握現在狀況，能提早預測接下來的進行方向。|||・具體優秀的總結能力和文檔制作能力。能把高層提出的要點簡潔明了地通過書面形式傳達給相關客戶，相關部門。|||＜靈活力＞|||・日常工作/高層交付任務中具備細節檢查能力，並能同時處理多任務的應變力|||・面對突然的日程變更能與相關部門進行良好溝通，執行迅速執行解決方法。日常與各部門緊密連攜，能夠自由靈活應對變化這件事情。|||＜有相關經驗可：事業相關技能＞|||・多部門以及事業部門的支援經驗（包括新規事業的銷售報告書制作，以及公司內部所有部門的臨時支援）|||・項目管理：團隊成員的任務和進度管理、會議報告資料制作、員工關懷|||＜其他＞|||・抗壓能力：能感受到高壓工作下帶來的成就感，具備強大的心理承受力。|||①應徵前請務必，點閱|||更一步了解敝司|||②透過平台提供日文履歷表及職務經歷表（亦可面談後再補）|||③本社在東京，因此由專員連繫採視訊方式面試。|||◆|||◆|||應徵＞書類審查（日文履歷表＋職務經歷書＞專人聯絡＞填寫日文履歷書＞安排視訊面談共兩次＞日文＋中文視訊面談＞1-2週內合格通知＞確認薪資＞進行簽證申請＞確認赴日時間
